name: Neonsweeper (Minesweeper)
description:
NEONSWEEPER (Neon Minesweeper).

This is the old-fashioned Minesweeper that I have developed—specifically designed for sci-fi lovers.

The game comes with 2 types of Game Modes: Traditional and Arcade.
4 tile sizes: Massive, Big, Medium, and Small.
With 4 difficulties: Extreme, Hard, Medium, and Easy.

The Traditional game mode is obviously the old-fashioned Minesweeper, with a Stopwatch.

However, with Arcade mode, you'll need to win the game before the time runs out. If the Timer hits 0, the board is locked down, and you lose.
Will you be able to win the game in Arcade mode with Massive size and Extreme difficulty?
